fields.text:
Thanks Frank for the awesome repair work on my scooter. It was worth the wait when booking into your always busy workshop.
It rides like it did when you sold it to me back in 2005.

Frank always has a solution to any scooter probs and he goes out of his way to help out.
He does the best services and he shares his rather vast knowledge of scooters and takes his time to explain the why and what he has done on your motor.
Friendly and great service.  He's a keeper! Well for scootering anyway!
Most generous with his time a rarity these days.
Frank is the man! Very kind & genuine. Helped me out with a replacement belt & even took time out of his day to demonstrate some things for me. Top bloke!

Frank is an absolute perfectionist!
Just chatting with Frank about scooters especially old school 2 strokes you can see how passionate he is about his work.
I couldnt take my Bee Wee away until I had properly riden her and Frank had gone over her again and againðŸ˜‚.
At the Scooter Shop they care about reputation.
Cheers Frank, another happy customerðŸ˜Š
I bought my Vespa from the Scooter Shop. Frank and Mary are super helpful and kind people. Going above and beyond for their customers. 10/10 recommend them for your next motorbike!
The guy here is an absolute legend. Has helped me out twice now and its been brilliant both times. I definitely recommend and will be coming back.
